To the left of the ego vehicle, there are temporary orange and white striped barricades, which likely indicate road work or a closed lane. These barriers imply that there may be a need for a lane shift or merge ahead, which will affect the driving path of the ego vehicle.

Lastly, the road is clear of any other objects, such as debris or dustbins, that could influence the driving behavior of the ego vehicle.
